commander.name: Commander
commander.description: Improves the accuracy of allies in a 3-space radius by 10

commander2.name: Commander II
commander2.description: Improves the accuracy of allies in a 3-space radius by 15

commander3.name: Commander III
commander3.description: Improves the accuracy of allies in a 3-space radius by 20

imperator.name: Imperator
imperator.description: Improves the accuracy of all allies by 20

imbecile.name: Imbecile
imbecile.description: Inflicts ACC/EVA -10, ATK/DEF/RES -1 to allies in a 5-space radius

charisma.name: Charisma
charisma.description: Improves the evasion of allies in a 5-space radius by 5

starmaidensgrace.name: Starmaiden's Grace
starmaidensgrace.description: Improves the ATK/DEF/RES of all allies by 2

battlehymn.name: Battle Hymn
battlehymn.description: Improves the ATK of allies in a 3-space radius by 1

darkpall.name: Dark Pall
darkpall.description: Improves the DEF/RES of all allies by 3

delirium.name: Delirium
delirium.description: Improves the critical hit rate of all allies by 17

glamor.name: Glamor
glamor.description: Improves the ATK of adjacent allies by 3

goodneighbor.name: Good Neighbor
goodneighbor.description: Improves the DEF/RES of adjacent allies by 3

goodneighbor2.name: Good Neighbor II
goodneighbor2.description: Improves the DEF/RES of adjacent allies by 5

multichance.name: Multichance
multichance.description: Unit may strike twice consecutively (AGI ×3)% of the time

triplethreat.name: Triple Threat
triplethreat.description: Unit may strike thrice consecutively 20% of the time

flurry.name: Flurry
flurry.description: Unit may strike five times consecutively (DEX)% of the time

deificrevels.name: Deific Revels
deificrevels.description: Unit may strike five times (DEX ×3)% of the time

criticaledge.name: Critical Edge
criticaledge.description: Improves the unit's critical hit rate by the dexterity value

mettle.name: Mettle
mettle.description: Improves CRIT by (HP lost/full HP) ×50 if unit's HP is under 50%

wrath.name: Wrath
wrath.description: Has a 25% chance of producing a critical hit when counterattacking

criticalreprisal.name: Critical Reprisal
criticalreprisal.description: Guarantees the unit's counterattacks are critical hits

shield.name: Shield
shield.description: Has a (DEX)% chance of nullifying an opponent's attack

greatshield.name: Greatshield
greatshield.description: Has an 18% chance of nullifying an opponent's attack

axedefend.name: Axe Defend
axedefend.description: Negates incoming attacks with an axe

aegis.name: Aegis
aegis.description: Negates incoming attacks with a shield of magic

aegis2.name: Aegis II
aegis2.description: Negates incoming attacks with a shield of magic

orison.name: Orison
orison.description: Improves EVA by (HP lost/full HP) ×50 if unit's HP is under 50%

benison.name: Benison
benison.description: Has a (LUCK ×2)% chance of saving the unit from a mortal blow

criticaldodge.name: Critical Dodge
criticaldodge.description: Nullifies the opponent's critical hit rate

ambush.name: Ambush
ambush.description: May attack first during combat (AGI ×5)% of the time

regenesis.name: Regenesis
regenesis.description: Recovers 5 HP at the start of each turn

grandregenesis.name: Grand Regenesis
grandregenesis.description: Recovers 30 HP at the start of each turn

lifesieve.name: Lifesieve
lifesieve.description: Recovers HP by inflicted amount of damage

deathless.name: Deathless
deathless.description: Becomes invincible in combat (cannot go below 1 HP)

industry.name: Industry
industry.description: May perform a second action with 15% chance

secondwind.name: Second Wind
secondwind.description: May perform a second action with 15% chance

lockpick.name: Lockpick
lockpick.description: Opens doors, chests and gates without a key

diligence.name: Diligence
diligence.description: Increases EXP intake by 50%; applies even after class change

herbforager.name: Herb Forager
herbforager.description: May obtain a Herbs from the wild with 15% chance (until Turn 23)

recondition.name: Recondition
recondition.description: 1st item in the inventory gains +1 use each turn (until Turn 20)

variegate.name: Variegate
variegate.description: Blend in with the surroundings to become invisible (Assassins only)

darkhorse.name: Dark Horse
darkhorse.description: Growth rates for every non-mobility stats are increased by 10%

supplier.name: Supplier
supplier.description: Confers unit access to the convoy

doublemarch.name: Double March
doublemarch.description: Allows the unit to move with remaining movement after an action

advancedclass.name: Advanced Class
advancedclass.description: Reduces EXP intake to 60% (except for innately-earned EXP).
